title: Transform your startup with strategic tech leadership
subtitle: I solve problems in three key areas

items.title: Product
items.problem: You've validated the idea, but turning it into a real product is another story. What to build first? How to avoid wasting months on the wrong features?
items.solution: I define the roadmap with you. I prioritize features that matter for the market and build foundations for growth without having to redo everything.

items.title: Tech
items.problem: You need an architecture that can handle growth, but every decision feels binding. How do you build without having to redo everything in six months?
items.solution: I design and build the right architecture for this stage. I make technical choices that give you flexibility, not debt.

items.title: Team
items.problem: It's time for your first technical hires. Who to hire? How to evaluate them? How to get them working well together?
items.solution: I support you in key hires. I define roles, processes, and tech culture. I build a team that can stand on its own.
